mean_cn: n. 天文台，气象台，瞭望台
mean_en: a special building for studying stars, planets, weather, etc. :a building from which scientists study and watch the sky
short_phrase: The observatory is for watching the stars.
sentence: The observatory was built to observe stars at night.
sentence_trans: 那个天文台的建立是为了观察夜空中的星体。
